dcterms:description: The GTA5 dataset is used as a source of synthetic images for refining to the real-world CityScapes domain, highlighting the semantic mismatch between the two datasets.
dcterms:title: GTA5 Dataset

dcterms:creator: M. Cordts

dcterms:description: The CityScapes dataset is utilized as the target domain for evaluating the performance of the synthetic image refinement method, providing real-world urban scene images.
dcterms:title: CityScapes Dataset

dcterms:creator: G. Ros
L. Sellart

A. M. Lopez
dcterms:description: The Synthia dataset is mentioned as a challenging source of synthetic images for refining to the CityScapes domain, emphasizing the differences in viewpoints and classes.
dcterms:title: Synthia Dataset
